first_para: Philip Thomas Hollobone (born 7 November 1964) is a British Conservative Party politician who is both a Member of Parliament for the Kettering constituency (since the 2005 general election) and a member of Kettering Borough Council for the Piper's Hill ward (since 3 May 2007).

full.extract: Philip Thomas Hollobone (born 7 November 1964) is a British Conservative Party politician who is both a Member of Parliament for the Kettering constituency (since the 2005 general election) and a member of Kettering Borough Council for the Piper's Hill ward (since 3 May 2007).
full.title: Philip Hollobone
